about_the_game:
After a Post-Armageddon event the world has gone back to its roots living in simpler times, back to swords, kings, and war. After the hero has chosen evil the world is left in ruins as everyone struggles to survive in this new found world. If you have magic you're hunted to extinction. Put yourself into the eyes of one of the seven races and fight for the lives of everyone in the world while being hunted.

More and new giant creatures appear throughout the world with the intent of keeping the people in line. Build up your power and face evil head on! Level up and kill these giant foes with your friends or by yourself in this massive world.

Each server contains a player limit of 8 of which you can either explore as a team or as enemies. Sail the seas, explore dungeons, design your own unique character, craft weapons and armor to further your skill tree on your quest to become a master of your craft. Complete diverse side quests, solve temple riddles, build up your town and go to war with the forces that oppose you. Explore this story with a unique motive based on one of the 7 races you choose to play.

Take up arms and fight the oppressive forces that want to maintain control!
